statement.query: create table if not exists UserData ( id integer primary key autoincrement, name text, last_login_millis integer not null, first_time_info_dismissed integer default 0 )
create table if not exists Locations ( id integer primary key autoincrement, latitude real not null, longitude real not null )
create index if not exists coordinates_index on Locations(latitude, longitude)

create table if not exists TripData ( id integer primary key autoincrement, start_location_id integer not null, end_location_id integer not null, start_millis integer not null, end_millis integer not null, weather_status integer not null, temperature_celsius integer not null, traffic_level integer not null, trip_difficulty integer, time_estimation integer, rush_level integer not null, mean_of_transport integer not null, satisfaction_level integer not null,
foreign key(start_location_id) references Locations(id), foreign key(end_location_id) references Locations(id) )
select id, name, last_login_millis, first_time_info_dismissed from UserData
update UserData set name = ?, last_login_millis = ?, first_time_info_dismissed = ? where id = ?
